sentences.sContent: The book will show you what the best CEO should know.
sentences.sContent_eng: The book will show you what the best CEO should know.
sentences.sCn: 这本书会告诉你最好的执行总裁该了解什么。

sentences.sContent: You'd think it might be our CEO or the workers, but in fact, the stockholders control the money so they have the most power.
sentences.sContent_eng: You'd think it might be our CEO or the workers, but in fact, the stockholders control the money so they have the most power.
sentences.sCn: 你会认为有决定权的可能是我们的执行总裁或工人，可事实是股东控制着钱，所以他们的权利最大。

sentences.sContent: By the second one, I realized this was going to transform communications— not just for the CEO, but also it would change how we do business.
sentences.sContent_eng: By the second one, I realized this was going to transform communications— not just for the CEO, but also it would change how we do business.
sentences.sCn: 但是我意识到，第二种方式能够改变人们交流的方式，不仅仅是首席执行官，它也会改变我们做生意的方式。

trans.tranOther: the person with the most authority in a large company
